name: 知更鸟-The Robin
description:
A year ago, 13 people from different classes bullied the introverted and cowardly girl (Robin) in the school, which eventually led to the girl's suicide. However, 13 people concealed the truth and claimed that they didn't know, so they covered up the story. Until one day, 13 people were kidnapped at the same time. When they woke up again, they found that there was only a broken wooden house in a cold mountain without signal Campfires and wooden posts engraved with nursery rhymes. Here, in the face of dark nursery rhymes, they seem to see the wronged souls of Robin and revenge them...

GamePlay
The works focus on who is behind the scenes and who is the cause of "Robin" "The culprit of death" is two questions. The plot has many reversals and strong suspense. You can't guess the beginning or the end. You will play different roles in the work, and as the characters switch between different perspectives, immersive experience, into each character's inner world; Who is right and who is wrong? Can you get the answer at last?

Features
" Huge branch line system ": rich branch line plots, create unique reading substitutions

"Brilliant characterization of characters": The characterization of characters is vivid and exquisite, and everyone has their own secrets

"Multiple ending experiences": High freedom of choice, there are many different paths to choose from, each with a different story

"Thought-provoking content": The story reflects the social reality of school bullying, and brings us a lot of human questions besides the stimulation of reversal.
